Author: taw345272
Text: It’a so numbing, days go by and you barely notice because all you think about is how many calories you are accidentally ingesting from air. You are never skinny enough to go out or make plans, always a new GW that gets reached and crushed by you trying to fill the emotional void of this disease with binging. And yet recovery isn’t an option because at this point - your ED is your identity, coping mechanism,friend... And sometimes it feel like it’s all your have.

Author: heisenberg_was_hot
Text: it needs and wants to get you alone so it can become ur entire life
